resources.string: Field that back office can populate with Terms detail

Select Contact Method to Authorize Purchase with a Passcode

By checking this box, you agree that: (1) you are purchasing the above data plan from AT&T, under the AT&T Terms of Service at: www.att.com/USTermsandconditions (including arbitration clause); (2) OnStar will provide your billing information (including the above payment method details) to AT&T and (3) AT&T will begin charging the total amount listed on this page to the payment method each month until you cancel. You may cancel at any time by pressing the blue button in your vehicle or calling us at 1.888.466.7827. By placing your order, you agree to User Terms for Connected Vehicle Services.
Monthly plans are renewed every 30 days unless canceled; cancel anytime. To cancel, contact an OnStar Advisor, visit your myBrand app, or Owner Center.
We were unable to retrieve a quote for this product. Please call an advisor for assistance or click \'Quit\' to return to the app that made the offer.
We were unable to retrieve your preferred contact methods. Please call an advisor for assistance or click \'Quit\' to return to the app that made the offer.
We were unable to validate your identity with a one-time-passcode. Please call an advisor for assistance or click \'Quit\' to return to the app that made the offer.
We were unable to complete your request at this time. Please try again.
We were unable to complete your request at this time. Please try again.
The order submitted was not valid. Press \'OK\' to return to the app that offered the purchase. If the problem persists, please contact the app\'s vendor.

By checking this box, you agree that: (1) you are purchasing the above data plan from AT&T, under the AT&T Terms of Service at:www.att.com/USTermsandconditions (including arbitration clause); (2) OnStar will provide your billing information (including the above stevemerollis.codetrial.weather method details) to AT&T; and (3) AT&T will charge the total amount for your data plan shown above to the selected stevemerollis.codetrial.weather method. AT&T may temporarily slow data speeds if the network is busy.
